Metadata.title: PuzzlePlay - Turn Your Photos into Puzzles
Metadata.description: Upload your favorite photos and enjoy jigsaw puzzles and slide puzzles. Free, no installation required, no photos stored.

Home.heroSub: Upload your favorite photo and instantly transform it into a puzzle game! Enjoy jigsaw and slide puzzles for free.
Home.feature1Desc: No registration needed. Anyone can play right away.
Home.feature2Desc: Uploaded photos are never stored on our servers. Everything is processed in your browser.
Home.feature3Desc: Choose from 3x3 to 8x8 grid for your perfect challenge.
Home.feature4Desc: Choose between classic jigsaw puzzle and slide puzzle.
Home.step1Desc: Drag and drop or select your favorite photo
Home.step2Desc: Select jigsaw or slide puzzle and difficulty level
Home.step3Desc: Arrange the pieces to complete the original photo

Play.title: Play
Play.uploadDesc: Drag and drop or click to select a photo

HowToPlay.title: How to Play
HowToPlay.intro: PuzzlePlay is a free web service that lets you enjoy puzzle games with your own photos.
HowToPlay.jigsawDesc: Your photo is split into pieces and shuffled. Drag each piece to its correct position. Pieces will snap into place when dropped near their correct location.
HowToPlay.jigsawTip1: Start with corner and edge pieces
HowToPlay.jigsawTip2: Look for color and pattern clues in the original photo
HowToPlay.jigsawTip3: Use the hint button to see the original image
HowToPlay.slideDesc: A classic puzzle where you slide tiles using one empty space to arrange them in order. Click a tile adjacent to the empty space to move it.
HowToPlay.slideTip1: Start by solving the top row first
HowToPlay.slideTip2: Work on the last two rows together
HowToPlay.slideTip3: On mobile, you can also swipe to move tiles
HowToPlay.difficultyDesc: Choose grid sizes from 3x3 (easy) to 8x8 (very hard). Start with 3x3 or 4x4 and gradually increase difficulty as you improve.
HowToPlay.privacyDesc: Uploaded photos are never sent to or stored on any server. All processing happens in your browser, and photos are completely deleted when you close the tab.

About.title: About
About.whatDesc: PuzzlePlay is a free web service that lets you upload your own photos and turn them into jigsaw and slide puzzles. Whether it's a photo of your favorite singer, actor, or a beautiful landscape, any image can become a fun puzzle game.
About.whyDesc: Unlike traditional puzzle games with fixed images, PuzzlePlay lets you use any photo you want. Plus, since photos are never stored on our servers, you can play without worrying about copyright or privacy issues.
About.privacyDesc: PuzzlePlay never sends or stores your photos on any server. All image processing happens in your browser, and photo data is completely deleted when your session ends.
About.techDesc: PuzzlePlay is built with cutting-edge web technology. Using Canvas API for image processing and responsive design, it provides an optimal experience on both mobile and desktop.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: PuzzlePlay ('the Service') values your privacy and adheres to the following privacy policy.
Privacy.section1Desc: This service does not require registration and does not collect any personal information. Photos you upload are never transmitted to or stored on our servers — they are processed entirely in your browser's memory.
Privacy.section2Desc: Photos uploaded by users are processed exclusively in the browser's JavaScript engine and are never transmitted to any server. When you close the browser tab or start a new game, photo data is completely removed from memory.
Privacy.section3Desc: This service may use cookies to display Google AdSense advertisements. For more information about Google's cookie policy, please refer to Google's Privacy Policy. We may also use Google Analytics for service improvement, which only collects anonymized visit data.
Privacy.section4Desc: This service displays advertisements through Google AdSense. Google may use cookies to display ads based on your interests.
Privacy.section5Desc: You can delete or block browser cookies at any time. Since this service does not collect personal information, no separate deletion request is necessary.
Privacy.section6Desc: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us via email.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.section1Desc: PuzzlePlay is a free web-based puzzle game service. Anyone can use it without registration.
Terms.section2Desc: Users must not upload photos that infringe on others' copyrights, portrait rights, or other rights. Since this service does not store photos on servers, legal responsibility for uploaded photos lies with the user.
Terms.section3Desc: This service relies on the user's browser performance for image processing. Service availability may vary depending on device specifications.
Terms.section4Desc: This service is provided 'as is' and we are not responsible for service interruptions, errors, or other issues.
Terms.section5Desc: These terms may be changed without prior notice. Updated terms take effect from the time they are posted on the service.
